resources.string:
"[VACCINATION SCHEDULE]

Good day" + [FIRST NAME] + [MIDDLE NAME] + [LAST NAME] + "!

Thank you for registering for your COVID-19 vaccine. Your vaccination schedule is shown below. Please refer to the following details:

Date:" + [SCHEDULED DATE] + "
Time:" + [TIME] + "
Venue:" + [VACCINATION SITE] + "

Please bring a valid ID, ballpen, and hand sanitizer. Come promptly on your designated time and don't forget to wear your face mask and face shield.

For queries, call our hotline at 8532-5001 loc 471-480 Monday-Saturday from 8AM-8PM. 

Stay safe!"
